name: Moto Pizza Courier
description:
“Hello, I would like to buy 2 large pizzas with extra cheese.” Does that sound familiar? Now, imagine that you receive calls like this.

Moto Pizza Courier presents the fastest network of pizza distributors in the city. Your main goal is to take the food to the customers as quickly as possible.
For this you will have a scooter that will allow you to do the impossible possible.

If not, you'd have to pony up the cash for something with more horsepower. The faster you are, the more money you make. Start your new job of pizza courier right now!
Game Features :
- 10 levels
- 4 types of motorcycles
- Time limit for each mission
